text: And he said, The Lord came from Sinai, and from Seer he rose up to us, he hath appeared from Mount Faran, and with him thousands of saints, in his right hand a fiery law.

segments.text: And he said, The Lord came from Sinai, and from Seer he rose up to us, he hath appeared
from Mount Faran, and with him thousands of saints, in his right hand a fiery law.
